SubToolType: Painting Operation to apply when left-clicking and dragging
PaintColor: The Color that will be assigned to painted triangle vertices
BlendMode: Controls how painted Colors will be combined with the existing Colors
SecondaryActionType: The Brush Operation that will be applied when holding the Shift key when in Painting
EraseColor: Color to set when using Erase brush
ChannelFilter: Controls which Color Channels will be affected by Operations. Only enabled Channels are rendered.
bHardEdges: Create Split Colors / Hard Color Edges at the borders of the painted area. Use Soften operations to un-split.
